CustomField.formula: IF( NOT( ISBLANK( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) ) , IF( DATE( 2000 , MONTH( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) , DAY( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) ) <= DATE( 2000 , MONTH( TODAY() ) , DAY( TODAY() ) ), IF(YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) > 0 ,YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ),0 ), IF(YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) -1 > 0,YEAR (Today()) - YEAR ( litify_pm__Date_of_birth__c ) -1, 0 )), null)
CustomField.label: Age
